Read files stored in an OneDrive

Source: R/OneDrive.R
OneDrive_file.Rd

This function reads files stored in an OneDrive

Usage

OneDrive_file(file, .function, ...)

Arguments

file

File path

.function

Function that will be used to reading the file

...

.function args.

Examples

 OneDrive_file("path/file.csv", read.csv)
